positioning.thesis: The future of technology investment lies not just in data, but in understanding human behavior and preferences around tech usage.
positioning.one_sentence_promise: Unlock the secrets of tech investment by learning how people's interactions with technology can shape the market.
positioning.who_is_this_for: Investors and tech enthusiasts eager to understand the human side of technology innovations.
positioning.what_they_will_get: Insights into how consumer behavior influences technology trends and investment opportunities.

differentiators.title: Debunking the Data-Driven Myth in Tech Investment
differentiators.description: Data alone cannot predict market success; understanding consumer behavior is equally important.
differentiators.why_unique_vs_competitors: While many focus purely on data metrics, this approach highlights the often-overlooked human element in technology trends and investments.

differentiators.title: Case Studies of Successful Tech Investments
differentiators.description: Real-world examples of how understanding consumer behavior has led to successful tech investments.
differentiators.why_unique_vs_competitors: Competitors often lack practical examples that reinforce theoretical concepts, making this approach more relatable and actionable.
